name: Old is Gold
description:
Ever wanted to see how long you could live in an entire minute? 

I have the answer for you right now, 1 minute stoopid. 

But have you ever had a strange desire to live an entire lifetime inside 60 seconds? 

Then you've come to the right game my friend.

Some Resources:

https://freesound.org/people/eliOsc/sounds/579976/
